verses.verse: A Psalm <WH4210> of praise <WH8426>. Make a joyful noise <WH7321> <WH8685> unto the YY <WH3068>, all ye lands <WH776>.
Serve <WH5647> <WH8798> the YY <WH3068> with gladness <WH8057>: come <WH935> <WH8798> before his presence <WH6440> with singing <WH7445>.

Know <WH3045> <WH8798> ye that the YY <WH3068> he is 'Elohim <WH430>: it is he that hath made <WH6213> <WH8804> us, and not we ourselves; we are his people <WH5971>, and the sheep <WH6629> of his pasture <WH4830>.

Enter <WH935> <WH8798> into his gates <WH8179> with thanksgiving <WH8426>, and into his courts <WH2691> with praise <WH8416>: be thankful <WH3034> <WH8685> unto him, and bless <WH1288> <WH8761> his name <WH8034>.
For the YY <WH3068> is good <WH2896>; his mercy <WH2617> is everlasting <WH5769>; and his truth <WH530> endureth to all <WH1755> generations <WH1755>.
